name: Mogis's Chosen
oracle_text:
Mogis's Chosen enters the battlefield tapped.
Mogis's Chosen attacks each turn if able.

name: Intervention of Keranos
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat this turn, Intervention of Keranos deals 3 damage to each creature.

name: Vitality Salve
oracle_text:
At the beginning of the Horde's first main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card.
Hero's Reward — When Vitality Salve is put into a graveyard from anywhere, each player returns a creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Consuming Rage
oracle_text: Whenever a Minotaur attacks this turn, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Destroy that creature at end of combat.

name: Plundered Statue
oracle_text:
At the beginning of the Horde's first main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card.
Hero's Reward — When Plundered Statue is put into a graveyard from anywhere, each player draws a card.

name: Reckless Minotaur
oracle_text:
Haste
Reckless Minotaur attacks each turn if able.
At the beginning of the end step, destroy Reckless Minotaur.

name: Descend on the Prey
oracle_text: Whenever a Minotaur attacks this turn, it gains first strike until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.

name: Massacre Totem
oracle_text:
At the beginning of the Horde's first main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card.
Hero's Reward — When Massacre Totem is put into a graveyard from anywhere, put the top seven cards of the Horde's library into its graveyard.

name: Refreshing Elixir
oracle_text:
At the beginning of the Horde's first main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card.
Hero's Reward — When Refreshing Elixir is put into a graveyard from anywhere, each player gains 5 life.

name: Touch of the Horned God
oracle_text: Whenever a Minotaur attacks this turn, it gains deathtouch until end of turn.

name: Unquenchable Fury
oracle_text: Each Minotaur can't be blocked this turn except by two or more creatures.

name: Altar of Mogis
oracle_text:
At the beginning of the Horde's first main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card.
Hero's Reward — When Altar of Mogis is put into a graveyard from anywhere, the Horde sacrifices two Minotaurs.
